quote_first: “Mrs. Bultitaft always puts on the hot milk at ten. At about
quote_last: we saw Sally carrying her mug up to her room.”
title: Cover Her Face
author: P.D. James

quote_first: Dalgliesh reflected that Etienne could hardly have devised a more effective deterrent to visitors and for a moment he wondered whether to walk the half-mile rather than risk his suspension. Glancing at his watch, he saw that it was
quote_last: . He would arrive precisely on time.
title: Original Sin
author: P.D. James

quote_last: that night when I was listening to Erroll Garner’s Concert by the Sea and drinking Seagram’s VO. Handy, isn’t it, keeping a diary like this?”
title: Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman
author: Haruki Murakami

quote_last: Have got new cassette in now. Right. Turn to “Recording.”
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding
